by.zti.main.serializer

Class SimpleXmlConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.zti.main.serializer.SimpleXmlConfig

  • public class SimpleXmlConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a simple implementation of native Java XML DOM functionality. This class should be used only to store simple key-value String parameters in specified file. Invoke put(String, String) method to save your config parameter to file, and invoke get(String) method to get parameter value from instance object.
    Since:
    ZTIU 1.0.4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleXmlConfig()
      This constructor will use defailtRoot string to reference file.
      SimpleXmlConfig(java.io.File file)
      This constructor takes File reference to config file to work with. if given file is already exists - it will load it, else it will create new file.
      SimpleXmlConfig(java.lang.String path)
      This constructor creates File reference from given.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)
        Invoke this method when you want to get value of tag in your config file.
        Parameters:
        key - Tag name.
        Returns:
        Value of tag.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String value)
        Invoke this method when you want to store data as tag value in your xml config file. If tag by given key is already exists in config file it will override it's current value, else it will create new tag with given key as name.
        Parameters:
        key - Tag name.
        value - Value for tag.
